aamod_emeg_rfx.desc: Group ANOVAs at sensor and/or source levels

DirFilter.desc: Filter for files to process (regular expression)
DirFilter.help: (BLOCK will be replaced with appropriate block name)

FileFilter.desc: Filter for files to process (regular expression)
FileFilter.help: (BLOCK will be replaced with appropriate block name)

levels.desc: Vector of number of levels of each factor
levels.help: (BLOCK will be treated as first factor)

effects.desc: Cell array of effects for each factor
effects.help: (BLOCK will be treated as first factor)

ROIs.desc: Cell array of ROI mat files
